agents.name: Clove
agents.description: Clove is a strategic controller agent known for her ability to manipulate the battlefield with smokescreens and area denial tools.

agents.name: Reyna
agents.description: Reyna is a fierce duelist agent who thrives on securing kills and sustaining herself in combat through her vampiric abilities.

agents.name: Gekko
agents.description: Gekko is an initiator agent who excels at disrupting enemy positions and creating opportunities for his team with his versatile abilities.

agents.name: Omen
agents.description: Omen is a mysterious controller agent who uses shadows and teleportation to confuse enemies and control the flow of battle.

agents.name: Vyse
agents.description: Vyse is a sentinel agent who specializes in area control and providing support to his teammates.

agents.name: Jett
agents.description: Jett is a fast and agile duelist agent who excels at flanking and taking out enemies with her swift movements.

agents.name: Chamber
agents.description: Chamber is a sentinel agent who combines precision shooting with area control to protect his team.

agents.name: Veto
agents.description: Veto is an initiator agent known for his ability to disrupt enemy strategies and create openings for his team.
